allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge origin/claude/project-review-OzoEc into dev

Resolved conflict by keeping both ErrorBoundary and NotificationProvider wrappers.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Merge origin/2025-10-30-osew-ocWq6 into dev

Resolved conflicts by keeping dev version \(newer code\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: Prevent duplicate notifications on bill creation

Move recently created bill tracking before showing success notification
and increase cleanup delay to 10s to ensure real-time subscription
callback has processed, preventing duplicate notifications.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
